oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Preconditioning: Organizing, Promoting and Marketing the Program
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wohlgemuth, Kurt
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: preconditioning
post weaning morbidity
post weaning mortalit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certified preconditioning (PC) is a positive contribution to the management offeeder beef calves. In spite of some fair criticisms, PC remains a proven tool to reduce post weaning morbidity and mortality. Incorporated into a total herd management effort, PC has often meant the difference between profit and loss. This has been true especially during the last 3-5 years. It is not easy to make a buck in the cow 'n calf business unless all tenets of management are observed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1984; 105-107
